text: Antony John Blinken (born April 16, 1962) is an American politician. Blinken was the 71st United States Secretary of State from January 26, 2021 until January 20, 2025. He was the United States Deputy Secretary of State from 2015 to 2017 and Deputy National Security Advisor from 2013 to 2015 under President Barack Obama. In November 2020, President-elect Joe Biden chose Blinken to be United States Secretary of State. Blinken was confirmed by the Senate on January 26, 2021, in a 78-22 confirmation vote. He plays guitar and has two songs available on Spotify. In 2002, he married Evan Ryan. They have two daughters. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:American guitarists Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Singers from New York City Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:United States Secretaries of State
title: Antony Blinken
